feed.title: HortusFox Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v3.3
entry.content:
Version 3.3 of HortusFox

Changelog

  • QR code for inventory items
  • Localization improvements
  • New language: Polish
  • Use external image resources
  • Location suggestions for inventory items
  • Allow setting different invitation URL
  • Fix further apostrophe errors
  • Initial testing structure
  • Updated underlying framework
  • Small bugfixes and improvements

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v3.4
entry.content:
Version 3.4 of HortusFox

Changelog

  • Community feature
  • Cronjob for auto-backups
  • Bugfix for cloning plants having an external image
  • Bugfix for dealing with duplicates when importing a backup
  • Fix style when having multiline name of a location in cards

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v3.5
entry.content:
Version 3.5 of HortusFox

Changelog

  • Added proxy authentication
  • Fixed deprecation warnings in input fields
  • Added location specific log
  • Fix listly migration in docker environment
  • Styling for e-mails via themes
  • Updated dependencies
  • New logo and other graphical assets
  • Custom host for image sharing
  • Allow searching for custom attributes
  • Custom actions for location specific updates
  • Fix docker timezone error
  • Many more API endpoints
  • Various improvements and bugfixes

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v3.6
entry.content:
Version 3.6 of HortusFox

Changelog - Fixed overlapping photo on certain screen widths in plant details view - Fixed that 'ID' and 'Location' are included when editing an inventory item - Fixed that apostrophes render inventory groups uneditable - Fixed width of inventory group table action column

entry.title: New release for HortusFox: v3.7
entry.content:
Version 3.7 of HortusFox

Changelog

  • Plant recognition using Pl@ntNet API
  • Switch between card and list view in location views
  • Toggle features such as tasks, inventory or calendar
  • Improve management of inventory group items
  • Embed custom code in the HTML head section
  • Increase memory_limit to avoid getting out of memory for photo processing
  • Bulk saving for users, locations, attributes and calendar in admin section
  • Select current date on date prompts for plant attributes
